abilities.desc: You can see and target enemies through Fog.
At the end of your turn, place a Fog obstacle into your space.
abilities.trigger: at the end of your turn

actions.name: Darkness Dawns
actions.desc: Place one or two Fog obstacles into empty spaces within range. You may teleport to an empty space within those Fog obstacles.

actions.name: Twilight Sorrow
actions.desc: Each enemy standing within Fog gains 1 Weakness token and 1 Fatigue token. Then, you gain 3 Speed tokens.
